SEARCH
Package gutek.repositories

Interface CardBaseRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<CardBase,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<CardBase,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<CardBase,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<CardBase,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<CardBase,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<CardBase>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<CardBase,Long>
@Repository public interface CardBaseRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<CardBase,Long>
Repository interface for managing CardBase entities. Extends JpaRepository to provide standard CRUD operations and custom queries for cards.

    • findByFrontAndDeck

      Optional<CardBase> findByFrontAndDeck(String front, DeckBase deck)
      Finds a CardBase entity by its front text and the associated deck.
      Parameters:
      front - the front text of the card.
      deck - the associated DeckBase.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the CardBase if found, otherwise empty.

    • findByDeck

      List<CardBase> findByDeck(DeckBase deck)
      Finds all CardBase entities associated with a specific deck.
      Parameters:
      deck - the associated DeckBase.
      Returns:
      A list of CardBase entities in the specified deck.

    • findByFrontContainingAndBackContainingAndDeck

      List<CardBase> findByFrontContainingAndBackContainingAndDeck(String front, String back, DeckBase deck)
      Finds all CardBase entities that contain the given front and back text fragments in the specified deck.
      Parameters:
      front - the fragment of the front text.
      back - the fragment of the back text.
      deck - the associated DeckBase.
      Returns:
      A list of CardBase entities matching the criteria.

    • findByFrontContainingAndDeck

      front - the fragment of the front text.
      deck - the associated DeckBase.
      Returns:

      deck - the associated DeckBase.
      Returns:

    • countByDeckIdDeckAndIsNewCardFalseAndNextRegularRevisionDateLessThanEqual

      int countByDeckIdDeckAndIsNewCardFalseAndNextRegularRevisionDateLessThanEqual(Long deckId, LocalDate currentDate)
      Counts all cards available for regular revision in the specified deck.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck for which to count cards.
      currentDate - the current date used for filtering revision cards.
      Returns:
      the number of cards due for regular revision in the deck.
